module.title: Info: Testimonials
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>testimonials`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>testimonials` ( `testimonialId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `rank` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0', `rating` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `email` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `abstract` tinytext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`courseCommentId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `rank` (`rank`), KEY `rating` (`rating`), KEY `username` (`username`), KEY `email` (`email`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
